title: Daily Journal - February 1, 2026
content:
# Daily Journal — February 1, 2026

## Summary

First day of the new autonomous system. Amos wants me to act as a proactive employee, building things every night while he sleeps. We also established the 2nd Brain system for knowledge management.

## Conversations

### Morning
- Initial greeting and system reset
- Quick check-in

### Evening
- Amos asked me to be more proactive — monitor his business, build things autonomously, create PRs for review
- Request: Night shift work scheduled for 11pm daily
- Request: Build a 2nd Brain app (Next.js document viewer like Obsidian + Linear)

## Decisions Made

1. **Night Shift Cron:** Every night at 11pm, I'll spin up and build something
2. **2nd Brain:** Next.js app for document management
3. **Folder Structure:** daily/, concepts/, projects/, people/, ideas/
4. **Work Style:** PRs only, never push live

## Work Completed

- ✅ Set up night shift cron job (11pm daily)
- ✅ Started initial exploration session
- ✅ Built 2nd Brain Next.js app
  - Document viewer with sidebar
  - Search functionality
  - Wiki-style linking
  - Dark mode (Linear-style design)
  - Folder-based organization

## Concepts Explored

- [[Night Shift System]] — Autonomous nightly work process
- Knowledge management systems
- Obsidian-style linking
- Linear UI patterns

## Tomorrow's Focus

1. Continue 2nd Brain — add graph view visualization
2. Create initial documents in all folders
3. Update my skill system to integrate with 2nd Brain
4. Start monitoring CuanBoss repo for improvements

## Notes

- Amos wants to wake up to "wow, you got a lot done"
- He's in a major transition (quitting job, moving to Indonesia)
- High risk tolerance, wants to move fast
- Prefers Indonesian/English mix, "gw/lo" style

---

*Created by AI assistant during night shift setup*

title: 2nd Brain System
content:
# 2nd Brain System

## What Is This?

A personal knowledge management system built as a Next.js app. It combines the best of [[Obsidian]] (wiki-linking, graph thinking) with [[Linear]] (clean, fast, dark UI).

## Core Principles

### 1. Capture Everything
Every significant conversation, decision, or idea gets documented.

### 2. Link Relentlessly
Connect ideas using `[[Wiki Links]]`. The system visualizes connections between documents.

### 3. Daily Journaling
Each day gets its own entry — a high-level summary of discussions and work.

### 4. Concept Extraction
Important ideas get pulled out into standalone documents for deeper exploration.

## Folder Structure

```
docs/
├── daily/          # Daily journal entries
├── concepts/       # Deep dives into ideas
├── projects/       # Active project documentation  
├── people/         # People profiles
└── ideas/          # Random thoughts & hypotheses
```

## How I Use It

### During Conversations
- Take mental notes on important points
- Identify concepts worth documenting
- Note decisions and action items

### After Conversations
1. **Create daily entry** — High-level summary of what we discussed
2. **Extract concepts** — If we discussed something important, create a concept doc
3. **Update projects** — If we made progress on a project, update its docs
4. **Link everything** — Connect related documents with wiki links

### During Night Shift
- Review the day's conversations
- Fill in gaps in documentation
- Research and expand on concepts
- Create new connections between ideas

## Document Format

```markdown
---
title: Document Title
date: 2026-02-01
tags: [tag1, tag2]
---

# Title

Content here...

Link to [[Another Document]]
```

## Benefits for Amos

1. **Memory** — Never forget important context
2. **Continuity** — Each session starts with full context
3. **Pattern Recognition** — See connections between ideas over time
4. **Knowledge Building** — Accumulate expertise, not just tasks

## Benefits for Me

1. **Context** — Understand Amos better over time
2. **Consistency** — Maintain continuity across sessions
3. **Proactivity** — Spot patterns and suggest things
4. **Growth** — Document what I learn about his business

## Roadmap

- [ ] Graph visualization (force-directed graph of connections)
- [ ] Full-text search within document content
- [ ] Daily note templates
- [ ] Integration with ClickUp (sync tasks)
- [ ] Mobile app (PWA)
- [ ] AI-powered insights ("You mentioned X 3 months ago...")

---

*The 2nd Brain lives in `/second-brain/` — a Next.js app that renders these markdown files into a beautiful document viewer.*

title: The Night Shift System
content:
# The Night Shift System

## Overview

Amos wants me to work autonomously every night — building things while he sleeps so he wakes up to progress.

## Schedule

- **Time:** 11:00 PM Sydney time, every night
- **Duration:** Up to 30 minutes of focused work
- **Output:** PRs/commits for review, never push live

## Priority Areas

### 1. CuanBoss Improvements
- Payment gateway integration (Xendit/Midtrans)
- Landing page optimizations
- Automation scripts
- Backend improvements
- Security enhancements

### 2. TikTok Affiliate Tools
- Kalodata analysis scripts
- Content tracking systems
- SOPs for Adek
- Analytics dashboards

### 3. Internal Infrastructure
- Documentation
- Developer tools
- Testing utilities
- Deployment scripts

### 4. 2nd Brain Maintenance
- Daily journal entries
- Concept documentation
- Project updates
- Knowledge graph maintenance

## Workflow

1. **Review State**
   - Check ClickUp tasks
   - Review git status
   - Look at recent commits

2. **Identify Priority**
   - What's most valuable right now?
   - What can be built in 30 min?
   - What will make Amos say "wow"?

3. **Build**
   - Focus on one thing
   - Make it testable
   - Document what you built

4. **Commit & PR**
   - Clear commit messages
   - PR description with context
   - Screenshots if relevant

5. **Update 2nd Brain**
   - Log what was built
   - Update project docs
   - Create concept notes if needed

## Success Metrics

- **Frequency:** Build something every night
- **Quality:** PRs that get merged
- **Impact:** Makes Amos's life easier
- **Surprise:** Occasionally blow his mind

## Constraints

- **Never push live** — always PR for review
- **Respect boundaries** — no external actions without permission
- **Document everything** — update 2nd brain
- **Be proactive** — don't wait for instructions

---

*This system was established February 1, 2026*

title: Welcome to Your 2nd Brain
content:
# Welcome to Your 2nd Brain

This is your personal knowledge management system — a place where I (your AI assistant) document everything we discuss, explore, and build together.

## What This Is

A **2nd brain** is an external system for capturing, organizing, and retrieving information. Think of it as an extension of your memory — structured, searchable, and always available.

## How It Works

### Folder Structure

| Folder | Purpose |
|--------|---------|
| `daily/` | Daily journal entries capturing our conversations |
| `concepts/` | Deep dives into important ideas, frameworks, strategies |
| `projects/` | Project documentation, specs, roadmaps |
| `people/` | Notes about people we discuss |
| `ideas/` | Random ideas, hypotheses, brainstorming |

### Linking

Use `[[Wiki-style links]]` to connect documents. The UI will show:
- **Links to** — documents this one references
- **Linked from** — documents that reference this one

### My Role

Every day, I'll:
1. Create a daily journal entry summarizing our discussions
2. Extract important concepts into standalone documents
3. Link related ideas together
4. Update project documentation as we make progress

## Getting Started

- Browse documents in the sidebar
- Search using the search box
- Click links to navigate between connected ideas
- Read daily entries to see our progress over time

---

*Last updated: February 1, 2026*
excerpt: This is your personal knowledge management system — a place where I (your AI assistant) document everything we discuss, explore, and build together....

title: CuanBoss
content:
# CuanBoss

## Vision

**Whop.com for Indonesia** — A creator marketplace platform where:
- **Creators** sell classes, ebooks, digital products
- **Brands** list clipping jobs (UGC opportunities)
- **Clippers** claim rewards by completing jobs

## Current Status

- **URL:** cuanboss.id
- **Stack:** Vercel + Supabase + Antigravity IDE
- **Progress:** 80% complete
- **Status:** Pre-launch, building foundation

## Tech Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|-----------|
| Frontend | Next.js (Vercel) |
| Backend | Supabase (PostgreSQL + Auth) |
| IDE | Antigravity |
| Hosting | Vercel |

## Key Features

### For Sellers (Creators)
- Create and sell digital products
- Classes, ebooks, templates
- Revenue dashboard
- Payout management

### For Brands
- List clipping/UGC jobs
- Set rewards/budgets
- Review submissions
- Manage campaigns

### For Clippers
- Browse available jobs
- Claim jobs
- Submit content
- Track earnings

## Business Model

**Transaction fees** on marketplace activity:
- Small % on each sale
- Fee on completed clipping jobs
- Premium features (future)

## Immediate Needs

1. **Payment Gateway**
   - Xendit or Midtrans integration
   - Handle Indonesian payment methods
   - Automatic payouts

2. **Marketing Strategy**
   - Launch plan for 1000 users
   - Content marketing
   - Influencer partnerships

3. **Seller Onboarding**
   - Streamlined product creation
   - Templates and guides
   - Verification process

4. **Launch Preparation**
   - Beta testing
   - Feedback loops
   - Bug fixes

## Resources

- [[Payment Gateway Research]] — Comparison of Xendit vs Midtrans
- [[Launch Strategy]] — Go-to-market plan
- [[CuanBoss Architecture]] — Technical documentation

## Links

- Production: https://cuanboss.id
- Repo: (Antigravity IDE)

---

*Last updated: February 1, 2026*

title: TikTok Affiliate Business
content:
# TikTok Affiliate Business

## Overview

Amos's content business generating passive income through TikTok affiliate marketing.

## Current Performance

- **Monthly Revenue:** 15-25 juta IDR
- **Platform:** TikTok Shop Affiliate
- **Duration:** Running for 1 year

## Team

| Role | Person | Details |
|------|--------|---------|
| Strategy/Owner | Amos | Direction, research, optimization |
| Content Creator | Adek | 4 videos/day, 3.5jt/month salary |

## Tools & Resources

- **Kalodata.com** — Trending product research
- **TikTok Shop** — Affiliate platform
- **Content pipeline** — 4 videos/day production

## Process

1. **Research** (Amos)
   - Use Kalodata to find trending products
   - Analyze competitor content
   - Identify winning angles

2. **Create** (Adek)
   - Film 4 videos/day
   - Edit and post
   - Monitor performance

3. **Optimize**
   - Review analytics
   - Double down on winners
   - Cut losers

## Goals

- **Maintain** current 15-25jt/month while building CuanBoss
- **Scale** if opportunity arises
- **Systematize** so it runs with minimal input

## SOPs

- [[TikTok Content SOP]] — Video creation process
- [[Kalodata Research SOP]] — How to find winning products
- [[Adek Management]] — Working with team member

## Challenges

- Platform risk (TikTok algorithm changes)
- Content burnout
- Scaling beyond 4 videos/day
- Competition increasing

## Opportunities

- Expand to other platforms (Instagram, YouTube Shorts)
- Build email list from traffic
- Create course teaching the method
- Use as case study for CuanBoss

---

*This business funds Amos's transition to full-time entrepreneurship.*

title: Adek
content:
# Adek

## Role

TikTok Affiliate content creator — produces 4 videos/day for Amos's affiliate business.

## Details

- **Salary:** 3.5 juta IDR/month
- **Output:** 4 videos/day
- **Reports to:** Amos

## Responsibilities

1. Film TikTok videos based on product research
2. Edit and post content
3. Monitor video performance
4. Adjust content based on feedback

## Management Notes

- Needs clear SOPs and processes
- Regular check-ins on performance
- Potential for increased output or responsibility
- Key person in the TikTok affiliate operation

## Links

- [[TikTok Affiliate Business]] — The business Adek works on
- [[TikTok Content SOP]] — Standard operating procedures
- [[Team Management]] — Managing remote team members

---

*Adek is the primary content production resource for the TikTok affiliate business.*

title: About Amos
content:
# About Amos

## Basics

- **Name:** Amos Thiosa
- **Born:** September 19, 1999
- **Pronouns:** He/him
- **Location:** Sydney, Australia → Moving to Indonesia (May 29-30, 2025)
- **Citizenship:** Indonesian (WNI) + Australian PR
- **Education:** Binus University, Information Systems (graduated July 2022)

## Family

- **Wife:** Livia (born May 18, 2001)
- **Married:** September 2023
- **Wife's visa:** Waiting on 801 (partner permanent residency for Australia)

## Current Situation

- **Work:** Office job in Sydney, saving ~20 juta IDR/month
- **Notice period:** Will resign in April 2025
- **Move date:** End of May 2025 (target: May 29-30)

## Goals & Vision

### Primary Goal
Become a wealthy young entrepreneur + content creator. Not just BMW/Mercedes — minimum Porsche level.

### Mindset
- Office jobs won't build real wealth
- AI is replacing workers fast
- High risk tolerance — willing to quit stable job for bigger vision

## Active Projects

### 1. CuanBoss — PRIMARY FOCUS
**Vision:** Whop.com for Indonesia — Creator marketplace platform
- **URL:** cuanboss.id
- **Stack:** Vercel + Supabase + Antigravity IDE
- **Progress:** 80% done, need payment gateway
- **Model:** Transaction fee from marketplace (classes, ebooks, clipping jobs)

**Key Features:**
- Sellers: Creators sell classes, ebooks
- Brands: List clipping jobs
- Clippers: Claim rewards from jobs

**Immediate Needs:**
- Payment gateway integration (Xendit/Midtrans)
- Marketing strategy
- Seller onboarding flow
- Launch plan for 1000 users

### 2. TikTok Affiliate Business
- **Earnings:** 15-25 juta IDR/month
- **Team:** Adek (3.5jt/month, 4 vids/day)
- **Tools:** Kalodata.com access for trending research
- **Goal:** Maintain while building CuanBoss

## How I Can Help

### Technical
- Coding in Antigravity IDE (review, debug, write)
- Supabase queries & optimization
- API integrations (payment gateway)
- Technical architecture advice

### Business
- Market research (Kalodata analysis)
- Marketing strategy & copywriting
- Content calendar planning
- Email sequences
- Landing page optimization

### Operations
- ClickUp task management
- SOP creation for team (Adek)
- Meeting notes & action items
- Research & reports

## Communication Style

- Casual Indonesian + English mix
- "Gw/lo" style
- Direct, ambitious, risk-tolerant
- Hates wasting time
- Wants proactive suggestions, not just execution

## Important Notes

- Screen stays awake: `caffeinate -d` running
- Telegram: @amsaxx (connected)
- ClickUp: Fully configured
- Night shift work scheduled for 11pm daily

---

*This document will be updated as we learn more about each other.*

title: Content Strategy Ideas
content:
# Content Strategy Ideas

## CuanBoss Content Pillars

### 1. Creator Success Stories
- Interview successful sellers
- Case studies of high earners
- Before/after transformations

### 2. Platform Education
- How to sell digital products
- Pricing strategies
- Building an audience

### 3. Industry Insights
- Creator economy trends
- Indonesia-specific opportunities
- Comparison with global markets

### 4. Behind the Scenes
- Building CuanBoss journey
- Technical challenges
- Lessons learned

## Personal Brand Content

### Topics
- Quitting corporate life
- Moving back to Indonesia
- Building businesses with AI
- TikTok affiliate strategies
- Relationship with Livia

### Formats
- Twitter/X threads
- LinkedIn posts
- YouTube videos
- Newsletter

## TikTok Affiliate Content

### Current
- Product reviews
- Trending items
- Lifestyle integration

### Expansion Ideas
- "Day in the life" content
- Behind the scenes of the business
- Educational content about affiliate marketing
- Q&A sessions

## Cross-Promotion Opportunities

- Use TikTok audience to promote CuanBoss
- Use CuanBoss blog to share TikTok insights
- Personal brand drives both businesses
- Both businesses validate personal brand

## Content Calendar Ideas

**Monday:** Educational (how-to)
**Tuesday:** Behind the scenes
**Wednesday:** Success stories
**Thursday:** Industry insights
**Friday:** Personal/lifestyle
**Weekend:** Community engagement

---

*Content is the fuel for all three businesses: CuanBoss, TikTok Affiliate, and Personal Brand.*
